snippet.title: Start On A Journey! | Official Trailer | AFK Journey
snippet.description:
AFK Journey is a 3D world-based strategy card RPG that immerses players in a captivating adventure. In AFK Journey, players have the opportunity to recruit and nurture a wide array of heroes, each possessing their own distinct mechanics and captivating personalities. Embark on a journey through the enchanting realm of Esperia, where players will be transported into an epic tale that beautifully intertwines themes of romance and bravery.
---------------------------------------------------------------
Follow us to get more informations: 
Official Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AFKJourneyOfficial/
Official Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/afkjourneyofficial/
Official Twitter: https://twitter.com/AFK_Journey
Official Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/AFKJourney/
Official TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@afkjourney?lang=en
Official Website: https://afkjourney.farlightgames.com/
